pr_title: Throw an exception which provides an info about vetoed property change

timeline.message:
Throw an exception which provides an info about vetoed property change

Fixes #3470

timeline.bodyText:
I would rename this to PropertyChangeDeniedException or PropertyChangeDisallowedException.
Veto is semantically right but it is still quite weird term to use and I think denied would be best English and _ disallowed_ quite close too.
